EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Customer Portal available June 20, 2016 for DCA Greenplum Database & Hadoop software customers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Pivotal Customer Portal for DCA Greenplum Database and Hadoop software customers is available as of June 20, 2016.
Your Credentials are: Email: LRN: PCN: {{lead.Marketo Social Twitter Photo URL:default=Not applicable for your account}}
Pivotal Global Support Services (GSS) is excited to announce that Pivotal Customer Portal has launched and we have created DCA customer records in Pivotal’s Customer Database and Entitlement system. This will enable EMC DCA customers with Pivotal Greenplum Database and/or Pivotal Hadoop software to register with Pivotal and:
- Open service tickets directly with Pivotal Customer Engineering for Pivotal Greenplum Database or Pivotal Hadoop software support. - Access the Pivotal Network to download the latest version of Greenplum Database or Hadoop software. - View & download documentation for Pivotal software products. - Sign up for proactive notification of new Pivotal software releases. - Search the Pivotal Knowledge Base for self-help solutions for Pivotal software products. - Learn about Pivotal's support offerings & policies for software products.
IMPORTANT NOTE: This Portal is only for service and support of your Pivotal Software (Greenplum Database or Hadoop software). You will continue to contact EMC for your DCA appliance hardware service and support.
What happens next?
On June 20, 2016, you can register with Pivotal at support.pivotal.io <[[mailto:support.pivotal.io]]>. This is a one time registration only. The process will include creating a new account, entering your credentials, and Pivotal Customer Number (PCN)/Location Reference Number (LRN), which are provided in this letter.
On July 30, 2016, all Greenplum Database and Pivotal Hadoop software open Service Requests (SRs) with EMC’s CSI system will be closed and replicated with Pivotal’s Zendesk tickets. During this transition period, please be advised to close all open tickets at EMC’s CSI if possible.
How to Register?
To register for Pivotal Support you need to first visit the Support Website <[[http://support.pivotal.io]]>. Once there, click on “Sign In <[[https://login.run.pivotal.io/login]]>” at the top right hand corner.
From the "Sign In <[[https://login.run.pivotal.io/login]]>" page, please select “Create Account” Fill in all the required fields on the following page and select “Sign up”.
A verification email will be sent to your newly registered address requiring you to click on a verification link within the email.
After clicking on the verification link; you will be redirected to complete the registration process in the Portal.
You will be asked to fill in three fields - the most important being the Pivotal Customer Number (PCN) and Location Reference Number (LRN), which are provided in this letter.
If you forget to add your PCN/LRN - the ticket will be routed to the Customer Service team for a support entitlement check.
Once registration is complete, you can sign-in and submit new tickets for Pivotal software installed on your DCA, with Pivotal GSS.
How to Submit a Ticket?
On the Pivotal Support <[[https://support.pivotal.io/]]> page, you can submit a ticket by clicking on “Submit a Ticket” or by signing in on the upper right hand corner.
If registered properly, you will see a drop-down of all products tied to your PCN/LRN. You can select the Severity level (referred to as SLOs), as well as a description box to explain your issue and attach any logs as needed.
Once submitted, this ticket along with all your future tickets will display in your account. Selecting any ticket will open it up and you can view all correspondences between our support team and engineers.
Have questions about your Pivotal Customer Portal? Check out our FAQs <[[https://discuss.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/220978448]]>, training slides <[[https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/gss-pivotal-academy/Pivotal+Support+Onboarding+Template-1.pdf]]> and video clip <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t6KphesqveY&feature=youtu.b...]]> for a quick tour on the Pivotal Customer Portal.
If you would like any further information or would like to opt out, please email us at customer-service@pivotal.io <[[mailto:customer-service@pivotal.io]]> or call us at +1 877.477.2269 <[[tel:1-877-477-2269]]>.
Sincerely, Your Pivotal GSS Team
